movies.title: Darr
movies.Plot: Rahul is obsessed with Kiran and stalks her constantly. However, Rahul goes berserk when she gets engaged to Sunil, a navy officer, and he decides to forcefully claim Kiran for himself.

movies.Plot: A retiring police detective pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

movies.title: Match Point
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.Plot: An ambulance chaser/carancho falls for an ER/ambulance doctor, he meets one night "at work" in Buenos Aires.

movies.Plot: The story of Richard Kuklinski, the notorious contract killer and family man. When he was finally arrested in 1986, neither his wife nor his daughters had any clue about his real profession.

movies.title: The Hateful Eight

In the year 1922, a rancher conspires to murder his wife for financial gain and convinces his teenage son to participate.

movies.title: The Titan

movies.title: Visaranai

movies.title: Intrusion

movies.title: Fractured
movies.Plot: A couple stops at a gas station, where their 6 y.o. daughter's arm is fractured. They hurry to a hospital. Something strange is going on there. The wife and daughter go missing.

movies.Plot: It will tell the haunting story of broken souls, toxins, looming environmental and spiritual catastrophes, and the ties that bind a parent to a child.

movies.title: Secret Obsession

movies.Plot: The dark secrets of a seemingly peaceful island threaten to swallow up an orphaned student when he grows close to a mysterious new teacher.

movies.title: The Good Nurse

movies.title: Time to Hunt

movies.title: Raat Akeli Hai
movies.Plot: Follows a small town cop who is summoned to investigate the death of a politician which gets complicated by the victim's secretive family and his own conflicted heart.

movies.title: Oxygen

movies.title: Little Siberia

movies.Plot: After witnessing a haunting in their hospital, two doctors become dangerously obsessed with obtaining scientific proof that ghosts exist.
